body: Moving this from the Docker file to the CI build scripts is fine, and it's the only solutionI can think of. If you want non-CI builds to have it then you should script the Docker build command, and instruct people to use the script to build Docker images. Regardless, it doesn't matter to me as longs as /__version__ has all the bits when I deploy it.
